I just think it's sad that he's smaller than the REV version. I guess increased scale doesn't apply to Giants? Same thing for Dragon Man.
February 11, 2021
Goop
Giants with 0 range and no move and attack are pretty iffy in my opinion. Most of the time you will get zapped by range before you have a chance to get in there and attack. Even with super strength and 4 dmg to hit for 6 i think he's dead before he has a chance to swing. Granting all sidekicks shape change is where the money is, and when you combine him with spiderman to give super senses also. Best to play at 35 and hide in a corner somewhere.
